Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Player

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Apollo, Ares, Artemis, Atlas, Demeter, Hephaestus, Minotaur, Pan, PlayerWithGroundEffect, Prometheus, Triton, Zeus
public abstract class Player
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
The player is used by the controller to change the model between a Strategy pattern's approach: is responsible of all changes in the grid and all the actions that could be done by its workers are described in this class. The class is abstract because it needs an implementation depending on which God the user decides to use during the game.
See Also:

    • nextPhase

      public void nextPhase()
      This function needs an implementation of the FSM structure which describe game's round for each kind of god. For each state, the function had to decide the next state, depends also if the power is active or not.
